colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @038A *, ,(CES ZHING MCHOG BDE BA CAN DU SKYE BA'I RGYU TSOGS MA TSANG BA MED PAR NYAMS SU LEN TSUL SKAL BZANG 'JUGS NGOGS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RTZIS RIG LA MKHAS PA DGE BSHES DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG GDUGS DKAR SKYABS DANG, GSO RIG LA MKHAS PA DGE SLONG BYAMS PA THOGS MED DANG, ZHING DER DAD MOS DANG LDAN PA DGE BSNYEN CHOS SKYONG SKYABS RNAMS KYIS ZHING MCHOG BDE BA CAN GYI YON TAN DRAN PA DANG ZHING DER SKYE BA'I PHAN YON SOGS RGYAS PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, ^BTZUN GZUGS BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN GYIS BDE BA CAN ZHING BKOD KYIS MDO GNYIS DANG, RJE BLA MA BDAG NYID CHEN POS MDZAD PA'I ZHING MCHOG SGO 'BYED DANG, SANGS RGYAS SNANG BA MTHA' YAS NGUR SMRIG GAR GYI RNAM PAR ROL PA PAn CHEN RNAM PA GNYIS KYI GSUNG RAB RNAMS DANG, RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE RNAM GNYIS KYI GSUNG RAB RNAMS DANG, RANG GI DRIN CAN RTZA BA'I BLA MA'I RIN PO CHE RNAM PA GNYIS KYI GSUNG RAB MANG DU 'BYUNG BA SOGS LA BRTEN NAS DBEN GNAS RI KHROD THEG CHEN BSHAD SGRUB DAR RGYAS GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA'I SLOB MA DGE SLONG 'OD ZER GYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,)
